snippet: In testimony prepared for a Senate Banking Committee hearing on Wednesday, Jamie Dimon sounded a note of contrition, but also emphasized the strength of the bank.
abstract: In testimony prepared for a Senate Banking Committee hearing on Wednesday, Jamie Dimon sounded a note of contrition, but also emphasized the strength of the bank.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG

headline.main: JPMorgan Chief Is Expected to Play Down Trade Risks at Hearing
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Chief Expected to Play Down Trade Risks
